revision.text:
{{no footnotes|date=January 2013}} '''Léopold Bellanger''' is a [[France|French]] [[actor]]. He was born {{date|20 June 1992}}.
== Theater ==
* ''[[Piège pour un homme seul]]'' by [[Robert Thomas (director)|Robert Thomas]] ''(L'abbé Maximin)'' * ''[[Frou-Frou les Bains]]'' by [[Patrick Haudecoeur]] ''(Saturnin Duguet)'' * ''[[Feu la mère de Madame]]'' by [[Georges Feydeau]] ''(Joseph)''
== Cinema ==
* ''[[Back Home (film)|Back Home]]'' by [[Hélène Duchenne]] * ''[[Sortir]]'' by [[Nicolas Leborgne]] with [[Philippe Nahon]] * ''[[Sauveteur en Herbe]]'' by Léopold Bellanger * ''[[Plein Phare]]'' by [[Cédric Bouet]] * ''[[Jean-Pierre]]''{{Disambiguation needed|date=July 2011}} by Léopold Bellanger * ''[[Au long court]]'' by [[Les Tontons Filmeurs]] * ''[[Au long Court 2]]'' by [[Les Tontons Filmeurs]] * ''[[Hitchcock by Mocky]]'' by [[Jean-Pierre Mocky]] with [[Claude Brasseur]], [[Stéphane Freiss]] * ''[[Elliot, ou la Nouvelle Odyssée]]'' by [[Christophe Vidal]]
== External links == * [http://www.imdb.com/name/nm5641385/ imdb] * [http://lbellanger.e-monsite.com/ Website of Léopold Bellanger] * [http://www.spectable.com/leopold-bellanger/98256/ Spectable : Léopold Bellanger ] {{Use dmy dates|date=July 2011}}
